Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.32401795 0.72586359 0.28611231 0.21174615 0.49385296 0.73792881
#>  [7] 0.07711183 0.97448719 0.87721868 0.83628106 0.38982469 0.62424073
#> [13] 0.11696005 0.36858105 0.02149291 0.88324173 0.50667108 0.91437858
#> [19] 0.83491271 0.38736736
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.02903368 0.70165492 0.87651553 0.71823287 0.92074375 0.64376060
#>  [7] 0.10478134 0.54049666 0.66860610 0.20461857 0.68706257 0.49815568
#> [13] 0.27865261 0.85535193 0.86381973 0.88467848 0.14473772 0.67363721
#> [19] 0.97451052 0.87129722

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.13587671 0.02419987 0.64116788 0.85268492 0.95116891 0.44454635
#>  [7] 0.38486612 0.58298451 0.83769145 0.82076769
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.9254354 0.1033161 0.5831423 0.3371243 0.4790731 0.5034860 0.3662149
#>  [8] 0.4152077 0.3084144 0.5680022
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.2303853 0.6710833 0.3563609 0.7401590 0.2185498 0.1994725 0.8793391
#>  [8] 0.4014943 0.1607990 0.2511644

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6015396 0.4886076 0.8601998 0.3261073 0.6633433
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.1889843 0.6311810 0.5664850 0.1931143 0.7113578
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.6706222 0.2167482 0.0686676 0.2557923 0.2860114
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.97294198 0.09945998 0.74749478 0.48722142 0.18450235

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.2736290 0.3651541 0.1367383 0.0818950 0.5363802
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.36046844 0.39527371 0.33667776 0.06991254 0.17919401
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.8215655 0.5128882 0.9278274 0.1258526 0.5358550
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.49228165 0.98887325 0.33981446 0.29074747 0.02348808

mclapply

(ncores <- parallel::detectCores())
#> [1] 4
stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(parallel::mclapply, X=1:4, mc.cores = pmin(1,ncores-1))
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.7753982 0.2045291 0.7798185 0.0733571 0.3740613
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.71322882 0.41474171 0.16758185 0.56655660 0.02970165
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.4290849 0.9130012 0.8519768 0.8760831 0.8519837
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.1605732 0.4759138 0.4938341 0.2588425 0.6928187

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.4         3.4          1.7         0.2     setosa
#> 2          4.9         3.6          1.4         0.1     setosa
#> 3          5.3         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 4          5.6         2.5          3.9         1.1 versicolor
#> 5          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.0         3.3          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 2          6.3         2.9          5.6         1.8  virginica
#> 3          4.3         3.0          1.1         0.1     setosa
#> 4          7.0         3.2          4.7         1.4 versicolor
#> 5          6.0         2.2          5.0         1.5  virginica
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.7         4.4          1.5         0.4     setosa
#> 2          5.6         2.7          4.2         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          7.7         3.8          6.7         2.2  virginica
#> 4          5.1         3.4          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 5          5.5         3.5          1.3         0.2     setosa

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.8         2.6
#> 2           6.0         2.9
#> 3           4.6         3.6
#> 4           5.4         3.0
#> 5           5.7         2.8
#> 6           7.2         3.0
#> 7           5.2         4.1
#> 8           6.5         3.0
#> 9           6.7         3.1
#> 10          5.3         3.7
#> 11          6.0         2.2
#> 12          5.1         3.7
#> 13          6.5         3.2
#> 14          4.8         3.4
#> 15          5.7         2.5
#> 16          7.1         3.0
#> 17          5.0         3.5
#> 18          5.7         3.8
#> 19          6.3         2.9
#> 20          6.4         2.9

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.9         2.5
#> 2          6.7         3.1
#> 3          5.4         3.0
#> 4          5.7         2.8
#> 5          5.5         2.4
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.6         3.1
#> 2          5.0         3.4
#> 3          6.7         3.1
#> 4          5.7         2.8
#> 5          4.7         3.2
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.0         3.0
#> 2          6.7         3.1
#> 3          4.8         3.1
#> 4          6.3         3.3
#> 5          6.9         3.1
